price: Сўнгра, сизлар ёлғонга чиқариб юрган нарса мана шудир, дейилади.
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
